        - Following Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-fragrant-jade-flower-icon.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/06/Black-myth-wukong-fragrant-jade-flower-icon.jpg)| Fragrant Jade Flower | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Yellow Wind Ridge and onwards

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts "Aged Ginseng," an uncommon ingredient in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is a small, thin plant found in Black Wind Mountain and later areas. Players can also purchase it from the Shrine store after rescuing the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain. Additionally, it can be used to randomly obtain "Millenium Ginseng," a rarer ingredient.
